Package apollo.gui.drawable

Interface Summary
Drawable An interface defining methods necessary for a drawable object
DrawableAnnotationConstants Constants used in drawing annotations (which stops to display etc).
DrawableSetI An interface defining methods necessary for a drawable object Merge this with Drawable? Drawables optionally have children? It would make descending the heirarchy easier.
 

Class Summary
DoubleHeadedArrow Draws a double-headed arrow (an arrowhead pointing inwards on each end of a rectangle).
DrawableDisplayTool  
DrawableEnsemblFeatureSet A drawable for drawing ensembl style (box around set) feature sets.
DrawableFeatureSet A drawable for drawing a feature set.
DrawableGeneFeatureSet A drawable for drawing result (computational analysis) feature sets.
DrawableGeneSeqFeature This is currently used by ensembl - see ensembl.tiers.
DrawableHalfArrow  
DrawablePhaseHighlightGeneFeatureSet A drawable for drawing result (computational analysis) feature sets.
DrawablePhaseHighlightGeneSeqFeature  
DrawablePhaseHighlightNoHatGeneFeatureSet  
DrawablePrimerSet  
DrawableResultFeatureSet A drawable for drawing result (computational analysis) feature sets.
DrawableResultSeqFeature A drawable for drawing result (computational analysis) spans.
DrawableSeqFeature A drawable for drawing basic sequence features.
DrawableUtil  
PromoterGlyph A glyph that draws a solid bar with a triangle at the top or bottom.
SiteCodon SiteCodon is a class to accomodate the optimizations in SiteView and Sites.
ThinRectangle Draws a thin (half height) rectangle, vertically centered in boxBounds
Triangle A glyph that draws a solid bar with a triangle at the top or bottom.
Zigzag Draws a zig zag
